channel.title: How do i hide my client files?
channel.description:
well i dont want people leeching my client, i have spent a lot of time on it.
So how do i hide the files, so people cant leech.
When i try to delete or move the files, client wont load..
Please help.
Thanks

item.title: How do i hide my client files?
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Would that hide the .class files too?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i hide my client files?

item.title: How do i hide my client files?
item.dc:creator: @Maedie1 Maedie1
item.description:
@Maedie1 wrote:

That won’t work someone can easily go and unhide it. If you really want to prevent leaching, go to the command prompt and navigate to the client folder. Once there type del *.java This is permanent however, so backup you files before you do so.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i hide my client files?

item.title: How do i hide my client files?
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

Select all of the files you want to hide and right click>Properties and click Hidden

Read full topic
item.source: How do i hide my client files?
